page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: Maghull is notable for its large number of recreational and social clubs and cultural societies, all of which are keenly supported. Local organisations include Round Table, Model Engineering Socy, St.Andrew'S Players, Canine Society, Pensioners', A.T.C, Red Cross, Scottish, Photographic and Music Societies, and St. John's Ambulance Youth Clubs and similar organisations are well supported, and Scouts, Cubs, Guides, Brownies and Cadets, all of which have social as well as instructional activities. There is also a small but keen Y.H.A. club and a branch of the National Trust.
